languages.text: "Я рад, что вы все же приняли мое предложение... Пусть оно было весьма неожиданным".

traits.locale_text: "Я рад, что вы все же приняли мое предложение... Пусть оно было весьма неожиданным".

languages.text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."
languages.original_text: "Я рад, что вы все же приняли мое предложение... Пусть оно было весьма неожиданным".

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."
"I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."

"I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."

languages.text: «Me complace que haya aceptado mi oferta después de todo... aunque entiendo que fuese inesperada».
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."

traits.locale_text: «Me complace que haya aceptado mi oferta después de todo... aunque entiendo que fuese inesperada».

languages.text: 「予想外ではあったが…私の申し出を受け入れてくれて嬉しいよ」
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."

traits.locale_text: 「予想外ではあったが…私の申し出を受け入れてくれて嬉しいよ」

languages.text: “我很高兴你最终接受了我的提议……尽管这完全出乎了我的意料。”
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你最终接受了我的提议……尽管这完全出乎了我的意料。”

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|heureux|heureuse} que vous ayez finalement accepté ma proposition... même si je dois bien admettre que je ne m'y attendais pas. »
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|heureux|heureuse} que vous ayez finalement accepté ma proposition... même si je dois bien admettre que je ne m'y attendais pas. »

languages.text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr mein Angebot doch angenommen habt ... Auch wenn es reichlich unerwartet kam."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr mein Angebot doch angenommen habt ... Auch wenn es reichlich unerwartet kam."

languages.text: "Her şeye rağmen teklifimi kabul etmene sevindim... Hiç beklemiyordum."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you accepted my offer after all... Even though it was quite unexpected."
